name: wizard-tracker
description: Card game score tracking application with React frontend and MongoDB backend

scripts.setup: npm run init && npm run install:all && npm run setup-env
scripts.install:all: npm ci && cd backend && npm ci && cd ../frontend && npm ci && cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run setup-env && docker compose up -d
scripts.dev:manual: npm run verify && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:deps
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "cd backend && npm run test:watch" "cd frontend && npm run test:watch"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker compose down && docker compose build --no-cache && docker compose up -d
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test
scripts.postinstall: echo 'Run npm run setup for first-time setup or npm run verify to check your environment'

author: jkrumboe
